item.title: Four first-round picks for a star?! It's risky. Lessons from the past 14 blockbuster trades
item.description: As teams shy away from dealing first-rounders for stars, which trades have been the biggest successes and utter failures?

item.title: Party like '99? Three reasons for -- and three against -- New York winning the East
item.description: Nearly halfway through the season, do the Knicks look any closer to reaching the Finals for the first time in 26 years?

item.title: Drake Maye carries Patriots to wild-card win over Chargers
item.description: In his playoff debut, the second-year QB guides New England to a convincing win against Los Angeles.

item.title: Raiola joins Oregon as Ducks await Moore's call
item.description: Former Nebraska quarterback Dylan Raiola announced Monday on social media that he has committed to sign with Oregon.

item.title: Sources: Packers will try to keep LaFleur as HC
item.description: The Packers are expected to try to work out a deal in the coming days to keep head coach Matt LaFleur in Green Bay, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.
